titleStmt.title: By the King. A proclamation for restraint of the exportation, waste, and consumption of coine and bullion.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1603-1625 : James I)
James I, King of England, 1566-1625.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Bonham Norton, and Iohn Bill, printers to the Kings most excellent Maiestie,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: Greenewich, the eleuenth day of Iune, in the twentieth yeere of our reigne ..
Arms 14; Steele notation: late withstanding 2) howsoever, vttermost.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
